Articles.Content:
5 minutes ago, Obsidian_mc said:

Ceres is a proto-planet AND the largest asteroid, its a centaur of sorts.

I was saying Dres is a BIGGGGGG asteroid. It's special!

Holy crap, shut up.

1 minute ago, Obsidian_mc said:

YOU SHUT YO BOCA!

Explain to me what a "Boca" is.

1 hour ago, electricpants said:

But at least Ceres has colors other than grey.

What, 2 measly spots of white?

Ceres- a grey, crater-speckled rock. Literally nothing but a single shade of grey.

Dres- two huge biomes, a crepe ton of canyons, and numerous places to play around in.

How is this boring?

Edited May 23, 2016 by Matuchkin

14 minutes ago, electricpants said:

 

Explain to me what a "Boca" is.

Its spanish for mouth. Dres hater

Also I will not shut up, I can speak in this font too you Krkaen loving Dres hater

Edited May 23, 2016 by Obsidian_mc

2 minutes ago, Matuchkin said:

What, 2 measly spots of white?

Ceres- a grey, crater-speckled rock. Literally nothing but a single shade of grey.

Dres- two huge biomes, a crepe ton of canyons, and numerous places to play around in.

How is this boring?

So, by what everyone tells me, the only thing to to is have a rover race in a deep canyon. Who even does that? Why would you do a rover race by yourself? Are you that lonely?

2 minutes ago, electricpants said:

So, by what everyone tells me, the only thing to to is have a rover race in a deep canyon. Who even does that? Why would you do a rover race by yourself? Are you that lonely?

You can also mine the asteroids in orbit...

Make a cool surface base...

Make an interplanetary gas station for trips to Eeloo and Jool...

Make a mining operation in the canyons...

Make a tourist depot by the Canyons...

Take a rest stop and admire the beauty that is Dres...

#DRESISLOVE
Dres was the first planet I ever went to. I aimed for Duna and missed.

Just now, The_Rocketeer said:

Dres was the first planet I ever went to. I aimed for Duna and missed.

That's true, Dres will always be there to catch you.

5 minutes ago, WillThe84th said:

That's true, Dres will always be there to catch you.

BACK HIM UP, BACK US ALL UP!

@SpaceplaneAddict

HELP US MAN!

#DRESISLOVE

#DRESISKING

SPREAD THE WORD!

1 hour ago, Obsidian_mc said:

YOU SHUT YO BOCA!

 

1 hour ago, electricpants said:

Go to the 3rd page in the "Dres doesn't exist" thread (Made by Felsmak, not me), and you'll see why I don't really like Dres. I don't care if you think it's not an explanation, because I don't really know why (I'm not making this up) I hate Dres.

 

1 hour ago, WillThe84th said:

Also, compared to Kerbin/Earth Dres is much bigger than Ceres.

 

1 hour ago, electricpants said:

Just shut up.

 

1 hour ago, Obsidian_mc said:

Ceres is a proto-planet AND the largest asteroid, its a centaur of sorts.

I was saying Dres is a BIGGGGGG asteroid. It's special!

 

1 hour ago, electricpants said:

We were talking about Ceres being a protoplanet, and Dres, Dres just isn't a protoplanet.

 

1 hour ago, Obsidian_mc said:

It's also considered the largest asteroid in the solar system, so, technically, DRES IS THE ALMIGHTY KING OF THE SPACE POTATOES- I mean asteroids.

(max-creative is now following you)

That was quick

 

1 hour ago, electricpants said:

Also, Ceres is a left over protoplanet, which is friggin' awesome

This is an edit I made to that post.

 

1 hour ago, electricpants said:

Well at least Ceres has a giant ocean underneath it's surface.

Also, Ceres is a left over protoplanet, which is friggin' awesome

 

1 hour ago, electricpants said:

There's a little thing called "Ceres" that seems to fit that description.

But at least Ceres has colors other than grey.

DRES = CERES

End of story

If Ceres is cool (Which it is), then Dres is also cool!

Edited May 24, 2016 by ProtoJeb21
Bigger font, for SCIENCE!

1 minute ago, ProtoJeb21 said:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

DRES = CERES

End of story

If Ceres is cool (Which it is), then Dres is also cool!

Well said sir. Well said.

1 hour ago, Obsidian_mc said:

You can also mine the asteroids in orbit...

Make a cool surface base...

Make an interplanetary gas station for trips to Eeloo and Jool...

Make a mining operation in the canyons...

Make a tourist depot by the Canyons...

Take a rest stop and admire the beauty that is Dres...

#DRESISLOVE

You didn't answer my question. Why would ANYONE do a rover race by themselves? Are people THAT lonely?

1 hour ago, electricpants said:

So, by what everyone tells me, the only thing to to is have a rover race in a deep canyon. Who even does that? Why would you do a rover race by yourself? Are you that lonely?

The Mun has a bunch of rolling hills and small craters.

Duna is just flat.

Every other planet is a mixture of rolling hills and small craters, with some shallow cliffs.

Can we at least be thankful that we have a planet with kilometer-high, steep-as-hell canyons, and the lowest gravity of any parent body in the Kerbol system so that we can leap around said canyons? Its craters are very deep, its terrain is jagged, and it has a freaking belt of MOVABLE ASTEROIDS.

Why isn't this more famous than flat Duna, or Eve and Laythe (which are just equivalents of Kerbin, with different shaders), or Moho (not much, except of a single, tiny hole.)

1 hour ago, Matuchkin said:

-snip-

You didn't answer my question. Why would ANYONE do a rover race by themselves? Are people THAT lonely?

15 hours ago, Obsidian_mc said:

the beauty that is Dres

How about "the beauty that is Jool", because I don't want to stare at a grey rock for hours.

Edited May 24, 2016 by Red Iron Crown

3 hours ago, electricpants said:

You didn't answer my question. Why would ANYONE do a rover race by themselves? Are people THAT lonely?

 

2 hours ago, electricpants said:

You didn't answer my question. Why would ANYONE do a rover race by themselves? Are people THAT lonely?

Your question(s) presume(s) that someone is arguing that they want to do a rover race by themselves.

2 hours ago, electricpants said:

You didn't answer my question. Why would ANYONE do a rover race by themselves? Are people THAT lonely?

And you went off topic. I was talking about how nice the terrain was. I said absolutely nothing about rover races. As for racing- when the choice goes between

a) zipping through tight canyons on DMP, on Dres.

b) slowly rolling over a hill on another planet.

then I'd choose option a.

5 minutes ago, Matuchkin said:

b) slowly rolling over a hill on another planet.

The Mun has large craters that are steep around the edges, so you can roll down them and explode! Happy ending!
*ahem* electric pants, why not go to bop? If dres doesn't appease you, then surely a space potatoe will! also, all hail kraken and dres!

All hail kraken and Dres! 

But seriously guys, this was supposed to be for nice conversation about being nice to Dres. If you want to argue about this, I started a new thread. But please take you Dres the there ok? Please?

Actually, I have had some luck making a moon for Dres in a planet pack that I haven't finished yet. Long story short - it has a very smooth surface...

Oh well, my first 3 kerb mission outside of Kerbin's SOI was actually to Dres...

57 minutes ago, Galacticvoyager said:

*ahem* electric pants, why not go to bop? If dres doesn't appease you, then surely a space potatoe will! also, all hail kraken and dres!

Hey, you've changed!
The war was getting out of hand anyways, its was just a joke religion dangnabbit!

12 hours ago, electricpants said:

The Mun has large craters that are steep around the edges, so you can roll down them and explode! Happy ending!

Seriously, would you choose a crater over a massive canyon?

Exactly! I've seen a small canyon on the Mun before - but that's kinda boring and doesn't give much in terms of science, now does it?

Edited May 24, 2016 by Astrofox

14 hours ago, Matuchkin said:

And you went off topic. I was talking about how nice the terrain was. I said absolutely nothing about rover races. As for racing- when the choice goes between

a) zipping through tight canyons on DMP, on Dres.

b) slowly rolling over a hill on another planet.

then I'd choose option a.

That's something i'd love to see, someone do a sort of pod race through the Dres canyons.
